summary: Senior Full Stack Developer with 7+ years of expertise in architecting and developing enterprise-scale applications using React.js, Node.js, and modern JavaScript ecosystems

Demonstrated success in optimizing Single Page Application performance by 40-50% through implementation of advanced techniques including code splitting, lazy loading, component optimization, and strategic caching mechanisms

Specialized in architecting robust state management solutions using Redux and Context API, while implementing server-side rendering with Next.js to enhance application performance and SEO capabilities
Proven track record in cloud architecture and deployment, leveraging AWS, Azure, and GCP to build scalable solutions capable of handling millions of daily transactions
Expert in implementing real-time data processing solutions using Apache Kafka, ensuring seamless handling of high-velocity data streams in production environments
Strong advocate for code quality and best practices, implementing comprehensive testing strategies using Jest and React Testing Library, while maintaining 90%+ test coverage across projects
Experienced technical leader with a proven ability to mentor junior developers, establish coding standards, and drive adoption of modern development practices across engineering teams
Proficient in modern deployment workflows utilizing Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines, ensuring reliable and efficient application delivery across multiple environments

Extensive experience with Redux Toolkit and Redux-Saga for complex asynchronous state management, successfully implementing event-sourcing patterns and real-time data synchronization across enterprise applications

responsibilities: Architected and implemented a comprehensive React component library utilized across multiple enterprise products, resulting in a 30% reduction in development time and improved UI consistency
Spearheaded frontend performance optimization initiatives, implementing code splitting, lazy loading, and React.memo() for selective rendering, which reduced initial load times by 45%
Led the development of scalable frontend architecture using React.js and Redux, implementing domain-driven design principles

Designed and developed full-stack web applications

Architected and developed modern React-based Single Page Applications

Engineered robust REST API integration patterns
Established and maintained comprehensive component documentation using Storybook
Implemented state management solutions using Redux Toolkit and React Context API
Developed and maintained a reusable React component library
Optimized React application performance through code splitting
